title: Spiralling Out of Control
description: Temptation, depression, seduction, betrayal ... Not what Stephanie was expecting at fifteen years of age. Uprooted from her happy, all-girl high school life with a dream filled future and thrown into an unfriendly co-ed school, Stephanie spirals into depression.When charismatic high school senior, Jason notices her, Stephanie jumps in feet first and willingly puts all her faith and trust in him, a boy she barely knows.Every choice she makes and turn she takes leads her towards a dangerous path.Her best friend is never far away and ready to catch her â€¦ but will she push Tabbie too far away when she needs her most?Set in Australia, this novel contains adult themes.Recommended reading audiences 15+
author: Michelle Dennis Evans
